name: still life (itch)
description:
since you started living in this white cube you've been unhappy but at least you've been art

CONTENT WARNING: suicide, self harm (optional, minimal gore)

If the game seems like it's not loading - well, it is. It's about 4MB.

Take items from your inventory and use them to create art. Make sure you meet your audiences' demands.

Made for the Pippin Barr Game Idea Jam #2.

Arrow keys to move, z, x, c
Should work in full screen.

Barking dog is property of Keith Haring.
Stalker is property of Andrei Tarkovsky.

enjoy ( ͡~ ͜ʖ ͡°)
